hunting.name: Trail Camera for Deer Scouting
hunting.description: Great for monitoring deer movement and scouting for the season.

hunting.name: Scent Eliminator Spray
hunting.description: Helps reduce human odor when you are in the stand.

hunting.name: Adjustable Hunting Tree Stand Harness
hunting.description: Extra safety when you are up in a tree stand for long sits.

hunting.name: Deer Drag / Game Sled
hunting.description: Makes dragging a harvested deer out of the woods way easier.

hunting.name: Hunting Knife with Gut Hook
hunting.description: A reliable field-dressing knife for deer and other game.

hunting.name: Insulated Hunting Bibs
hunting.description: Keeps you warm during those cold, still mornings in the stand.

hunting.name: Hearing Protection for the Range
hunting.description: Protects your ears when sighting in rifles or shooting at the range.

deer_hunting.name: Deer Attractant / Mineral
deer_hunting.description: Helps bring deer into shooting range and keep them on your property.

deer_hunting.name: Whitetail Deer Grunt Call
deer_hunting.description: Simple call that can pull curious bucks those last few yards closer.

deer_hunting.name: Rattle Antlers / Rattling Bag

deer_hunting.name: Deer Drag Harness

deer_hunting.name: Field Dressing Gloves Kit

fishing.name: Waterproof Tackle Bag
